reviews.review: 非常好玩

This is my favorite game I've ever played not only do you get hours of fun and jokes it also has a steam workshop where the community gets to make their own testchambers and there is also a co-op mod with even more hours of fun. Trust me if you get this game and you like puzzles and portals and the original portal you will without a doubt have fun with this one.
After so many years, name a better game. You can't! valve are so good at making amazing games but so bad at counting to 3 :(

An absolute blast to play and tinker around with whether it be playing the main story, playing community created maps, making your own puzzles for the community, or in my opinion the co-op experience was the most fun I had playing this game. (If you have a friend who likes to mess with you or vice versa it might be a bit hectic and I say "a bit" very loosely but still really damn good game hugely recommend).
Amazing. Great to play community created content.
very fanny game xD
très bon jeu par rapport au premier :)

The original Portal is great, but [b]Portal 2[/b]: [list]
[*]is [b]longer[/b]
[*]has [b]more puzzle mechanics[/b]
[*]has [b]co-op[/b]
[*]has a [b]level editor[/b] & [b]Steam Workshop[/b] integration
[*]has some really [b]high-quality mods[/b] available on Steam
[/list]
Like I said in my review of the original Portal, the [b]Portal bundle[/b] was definitely worth the less than € 3 I spent on it during a sale.

Great work! Because this message is prerecorded, any observations related to your performance are speculation on our part. Please disregard any undeserved compliments.
One of the best games, that I've been ever played. A really must-buy in any of steam libraries, especially that's really often on sales.
For all the endless discussions of "Half Life 3 confirmed" I'd be just as happy with a Portal 3.
This game is phenomenal!

Buena secuela por parte de Valve, más puzzles, más personajes carismáticos, más música y un modo cooperativo imperdible. Si tal vez algunos puzzles sufren de ser una búsqueda de pared blanca más que una prueba de tu intelecto, la historia y los mapas de la comunidad definitivamente ayudan.
Este juego anda en oferta seguido, así que recomiendo conseguirlo cuando Steam tenga un gran evento como el año nuevo chino o navidad.

Es un juego realmente bueno, la historia es agradable, tiene un excelente soundtrack, ideal para pasar muchas horas entretenido tanto como en solitario como en la historia para multijugador, una lastima que no crearan un portal 3, pero alegra que la comunidad siga creando mapas que en ocaciones tienen creaciones especiales fuera de las mecanicas normales del juego y ademas pueden llegar a ser mas complicados! Super recomendado!

Pegue um game puzzle, ótima ambientação, excelente desenvolvimento, com modo cooperativo envolvente, linha de aprendizado acertada, personagens carismáticos, visão de primeira pessoa e a arma mais poderosa do universo, misture tudo e se delicie com o resultado que é Portal 2!
Trop sympa comme jeux, je vous le conseille fortement !

In general this game is on of the best games i have ever played.

Story: 9/10
Gameplay: 10/10
Graphics: 7/10

Details:
The story of the game is just addicting and you will love all the character (except one of them maybe).
The game has also a really good multiplayer, where you you have a little side story from two robots, which have to solve puzzels together. Workshop is also an option for this game, there are just so many maps from the community to play (they can also be played in multiplayer).

I would recommend this game to everyone, because you can´t miss the whole story of this masterpiece.

A two player portal game, some beer and a lot of fun. The challenges are awesome pretty simple and if you're of age and drunk enough it commits a challenge that is hillerious to share with your best friends.
I highly recommend trying the game, maybe even break the game sometimes to laugh at how the game broke and enjoy a team effort that is most likely to fail. One of the most fun games I've played. I enjoyed it personally hope you (The reader) will too.

Игра прекрасная. Интереснее, чем первый Портал. Больше комнат, больше свободы. А история Кейва просто заставляет игрока прочувствовать себя на месте ГГ, будоража нервишки разными фразочками.
Плюсы игры:
+ Разнообразие комнат
+ Кооперативный режим
+ Возможность почувствовать себя ГЛаДОС при создании комнат
+ Разнообразие локаций и персонажей
+ КОСМООС!
+ Картошка-ГЛаДОС
Можно перечислять бесконечное...
